bientity_action.description: This is a bi-entity action with the actor, the player, and the target, the animal you tamed.
bientity_action.markdownDescription: This is a bi-entity action with the actor, the player, and the target, the animal you tamed.

bientity_condition.description: This is a bi-entity condtion with the actor, the player, and the target, the animal you tamed.
bientity_condition.markdownDescription: This is a bi-entity condtion with the actor, the player, and the target, the animal you tamed.

x-intellij-html-description:
Action On Entity Tame

This power type allows you to run a bi-entity action when you tame a mob, on the tamer (Actor) and the tamed mob (Target).

Fields

Field Type Default Description
bientity_action Bi-entity Action Type optional This is a bi-entity action with the actor, the player, and the target, the animal you tamed.
bientity_condition Bi-entity Condition Type optional This is a bi-entity condtion with the actor, the player, and the target, the animal you tamed.

Example

{
  "type": "moborigins:action_on_entity_tame",
  "bientity_condition": {
    "type": "origins:target_condition",
    "condition": {
      "type": "origins:entity_type",
      "entity_type": "minecraft:cat"
    }
  },
  "bientity_action": {
    "type": "origins:target_action",
    "action": {
      "type": "origins:explode",
      "power": 10
    }
  }
}

This power will make it so when you tame a cat, it explodes.
